                      fig.width=9, fig.height=3.5, fig.retina=3,
                      out.width = "100%",
                      cache = TRUE,

                      message = FALSE,

                      fig.show = TRUE,

  invisible(grDevices::dev.off())
}
# set seed
set.seed(324)
